Module org.tquadrat.foundation.base
Package org.tquadrat.foundation.lang

Interface Printer

Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface @ClassVersion(sourceVersion="$Id: Printer.java 1005 2022-02-03 12:40:52Z tquadrat $") @API(status=STABLE, since="0.1.0") public interface Printer

Prints a formatted message.

This is a functional interface whose functional method is printf(Locale,String,Object...).

Author:
Thomas Thrien (thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org)
Version:
$Id: Printer.java 1005 2022-02-03 12:40:52Z tquadrat $
Since:
0.1.0

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default void
    print(Object object)
    Prints the given object instance after converting it to a String.
    default void
    printf(String message, Object... args)
    Prints the given message, using the current locale.
    void
    printf(Locale locale, String message, Object... args)
    Prints the given message.
    default void
    println()
    Prints a new-line.
    default void
    println(Object object)
    Prints the given object instance after converting it to a String, followed by a new-line.

  • Method Details

    • printf

      void printf(Locale locale, String message, Object... args)
      Prints the given message.
      Parameters:
      locale - The local to use for the formatting of the message.
      message - The message; this is a format String as defined for Formatter.
      args - The optional arguments.
      See Also:
      • Formatter.format(Locale,String,Object...)
      • PrintWriter.printf(Locale,String,Object...)

    • printf

      default void printf(String message, Object... args)
      Prints the given message, using the current locale.
      Parameters:
      message - The message; this is a format String as defined for Formatter.
      args - The optional arguments.
      See Also:
      • Formatter.format(Locale,String,Object...)
      • PrintWriter.printf(Locale,String,Object...)

    • print

      default void print(Object object)
      Prints the given object instance after converting it to a String.
      Parameters:
      object - The object to print.

    • println

      default void println(Object object)
      Prints the given object instance after converting it to a String, followed by a new-line.
      Parameters:
      object - The object to print.

    • println

      default void println()
      Prints a new-line.
